"Psychic Experiment" is a thought-provoking and atmospheric movie that explores the idea of reality manipulation, featuring an impressive cast including Adrienne King and Glenn Morshower. On the other hand, "Taken" is a suspenseful and action-packed thriller starring Liam Neeson as a former CIA operative who must rescue his daughter from a dangerous human trafficking ring. Both movies are sure to provide an engaging and entertaining experience!
